message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40. I'm willing to take a bit more since I'm making the first offer.
I'm proposing a 55-45 split in my favor. This is still a fair deal considering the inflation, and I believe it will be beneficial for both of us to reach an agreement now.
Considering the inflation, my initial offer is looking more reasonable. I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I should get a bigger share since the money is losing value faster for me.
